
```{r}
model = glm(isBest~history+capturedPieceEvaluation+history*capturedPieceEvaluation+lostMovingPieceEvaluation+history*lostMovingPieceEvaluation+isKillerMove, family=binomial(link='logit'), data = data);
```
